TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScriptReference extends System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase

summary.span: 注册 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 文件，以便在 ASP.NET 网页上使用。

span.span: Registers an ECMAScript (JavaScript) file for use on an ASP.NET Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过注册通过包含 ASP.NET 网页上的 JavaScript 文件对象。You can include a JavaScript file on an ASP.NET Web page by registering it through a object. 可以注册为 Web 站点上的.js 文件 （静态脚本文件） 所在的脚本文件。You can register a script file that is located as a .js file (a static script file) on the Web site. 此外可以作为资源程序集注册为嵌入的脚本文件。You can also register a script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly. 注册脚本文件之后, 可以在网页上使用其客户端脚本中的函数。After registering the script file, you can use its functions in client script on the Web page. 若要注册的静态脚本文件，设置属性的文件的相对位置的对象。To register a static script file, set the property of the object to the relative location of the file. 若要注册为资源的程序集中嵌入的脚本文件，将设置属性设置为包含该文件的程序集的名称。To register a script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly, set the property to the name of the assembly that contains the file. 然后设置属性设置为在程序集中嵌入的.js 文件的名称。Then set the property to the name of the .js file that is embedded in the assembly. 在这种情况下，脚本文件必须嵌入，未链接。In that case, the script file must be embedded, not linked. 您设置属性以指示是否使用调试版本还是发行版本的脚本。You set the property to indicate whether to use the debug or release version of the script. 值生成不同的结果，具体取决于它引用到单独的脚本文件或作为资源嵌入程序集中的脚本文件。The value produces different results depending on whether it refers to a standalone script file or to a script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly. 独立脚本文件定义与属性。A standalone script file is defined with the property. 必须通过访问程序集引用和属性。An assembly reference must be accessed through the and properties. 结果值如下所示：The results for the value are as follows: - 当应用于独立脚本文件位置指定属性，则值相当于。When it is applied to a standalone script file where the property is specified, the value is equivalent to . - 当应用于程序集中的脚本引用等效于。When it is applied to a script reference in an assembly, is equivalent to . 当仅指定，它用于引用该脚本。When only is specified, it is used to reference the script. 当和属性都已指定，而不是使用属性，但值在仍然相当于。When and the property are both specified, the property is used instead of , but the value is still equivalent to . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何引用自定义控件和嵌入在控件程序集的 JavaScript 文件。The following example shows how to reference a custom control and a JavaScript file that is embedded in the control assembly. 程序集被假定为 Web 站点的 Bin 文件夹中。The assembly is assumed to be in the Bin folder of the Web site. 自定义控件之间进行动画处理控件。The custom control animates controls. JavaScript 文件作为嵌入资源名为 SampleControl.UpdatePanelAnimation.js 编译。The JavaScript file is compiled as an embedded resource that is named SampleControl.UpdatePanelAnimation.js. 使用注册嵌入的 JavaScript 文件和属性。You register the embedded JavaScript file by using the and properties. 若要使用此示例中，编译 JavaScript 文件作为嵌入资源与自定义控件的示例中显示。To use this example, compile the JavaScript file that is shown in the example as an embedded resource with the custom control. 将生成的程序集放入 Web 站点的 Bin 文件夹。Put the resulting assembly into the Bin folder of the Web site. 有关如何在程序集中嵌入的 JavaScript 文件的示例，请参阅[演练： JavaScript 文件作为资源嵌入程序集](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8cb78cd-95a9-4dc6-92df-391866817e89)。For an example of how to embed a JavaScript file in an assembly, see [Walkthrough: Embedding a JavaScript File as a Resource in an Assembly](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8cb78cd-95a9-4dc6-92df-391866817e89). 下面的示例显示了使用自定义控件的页。The following example shows a page that uses the custom control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/vb/Default.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示自定义控件类定义。The following example shows the custom control class definition. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/customcontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/vb/customcontrol.vb#2)] 下面的示例显示了支持的 JavaScript 文件。The following example shows the supporting JavaScript file. [!code-javascript[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/UpdatePanelAnimation.js#3)] 下面的示例显示了代码，必须添加到包含自定义控件的项目的 AssemblyInfo 文件和 JavaScript 文件。The following example shows code that you must add to the AssemblyInfo file of the project that contains the custom control and the JavaScript file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/AssemblyInfo.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/vb/AssemblyInfo.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取或设置包含作为嵌入资源的客户端脚本文件的程序集名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the assembly that contains the client script file as an embedded resource.

value.span: 包含作为嵌入资源的客户端脚本文件的程序集完全限定名或部分限定名。

span.span: The fully qualified or partially qualified name of the assembly that contains a client script file as an embedded resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您设置属性引用的程序集中嵌入的资源作为包含的客户端脚本文件时。You set the property when you reference a client script file that is included as an embedded resource in an assembly. 设置为完全限定或部分限定的程序集名称。Set to the fully qualified or partially qualified assembly name. 完全限定的程序集名称包括名称、 区域性、 公钥和版本号。A fully qualified assembly name includes a name, culture, public key, and version number. 部分限定的程序集名称包括仅的名称。A partially qualified assembly name includes only a name. 指定的值时，还必须指定的嵌入资源的名称属性。When you specify a value for , you must also specify the name of the embedded resource in the property. 否则为将引发。Otherwise, an will be thrown. 正在引用的程序集必须位于 Web 站点的 Bin 文件夹中或在全局程序集缓存中。The assembly being referenced must be located in either the Bin folder of the Web site or in the global assembly cache. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何引用自定义控件和嵌入在控件程序集的 JavaScript 文件。The following example shows how to reference a custom control and a JavaScript file that is embedded in the control assembly. 程序集被假定为 Web 站点的 Bin 文件夹中。The assembly is assumed to be in the Bin folder of the Web site. 自定义控件之间进行动画处理控件。The custom control animates controls. JavaScript 文件作为嵌入资源名为 SampleControl.UpdatePanelAnimation.js 编译。The JavaScript file is compiled as an embedded resource that is named SampleControl.UpdatePanelAnimation.js. 使用注册嵌入的 JavaScript 文件和属性。You register the embedded JavaScript file by using the and properties. 若要使用此示例中，编译 JavaScript 文件作为嵌入资源与自定义控件的示例中显示。To use this example, compile the JavaScript file that is shown in the example as an embedded resource with the custom control. 将生成的程序集放入 Web 站点的 Bin 文件夹。Put the resulting assembly into the Bin folder of the Web site. 有关如何在程序集中嵌入的 JavaScript 文件的示例，请参阅[演练： JavaScript 文件作为资源嵌入程序集](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8cb78cd-95a9-4dc6-92df-391866817e89)。For an example of how to embed a JavaScript file in an assembly, see [Walkthrough: Embedding a JavaScript File as a Resource in an Assembly](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8cb78cd-95a9-4dc6-92df-391866817e89). 下面的示例显示了使用自定义控件的页。The following example shows a page that uses the custom control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/vb/Default.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示自定义控件类定义。The following example shows the custom control class definition. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/customcontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/vb/customcontrol.vb#2)] 下面的示例显示了支持的 JavaScript 文件。The following example shows the supporting JavaScript file. [!code-javascript[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/UpdatePanelAnimation.js#3)] 下面的示例显示了代码，必须添加到包含自定义控件的项目的 AssemblyInfo 文件和 JavaScript 文件。The following example shows code that you must add to the AssemblyInfo file of the project that contains the custom control and the JavaScript file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/AssemblyInfo.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/vb/AssemblyInfo.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示从资源注册客户端脚本文件时，URL 中是否包括 属性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the property is included in the URL when you register a client script file from a resource.

value.span: 如果在注册客户端脚本时未使用脚本路径，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the script path is not used when you register the client script; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您设置到`true`当你想要注册客户端脚本文件，而不包括脚本文件的 URL 中的值。You set to `true` when you want to register a client script file without including the value in the URL of the script file.

member this.Name : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置包含客户端脚本文件的嵌入资源的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the embedded resource that contains the client script file.

value.span: 作为资源嵌入到程序集中的客户端脚本文件的名称。

span.span: The name of the client script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您设置属性来引用作为资源嵌入程序集中的客户端脚本文件。You set the property to reference a client script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly. 如果两个定义的值并属性中相同的脚本引用，属性优先。If you define values for both the and properties in the same script reference, the property takes precedence. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何引用自定义控件和嵌入在控件程序集的 JavaScript 文件。The following example shows how to reference a custom control and a JavaScript file that is embedded in the control assembly. 程序集被假定为 Web 站点的 Bin 文件夹中。The assembly is assumed to be in the Bin folder of the Web site. 自定义控件之间进行动画处理控件。The custom control animates controls. JavaScript 文件作为嵌入资源名为 SampleControl.UpdatePanelAnimation.js 编译。The JavaScript file is compiled as an embedded resource that is named SampleControl.UpdatePanelAnimation.js. 使用注册嵌入的 JavaScript 文件和属性。You register the embedded JavaScript file by using the and properties. 若要使用此示例中，编译 JavaScript 文件作为嵌入资源与自定义控件的示例中显示。To use this example, compile the JavaScript file that is shown in the example as an embedded resource with the custom control. 将生成的程序集放入 Web 站点的 Bin 文件夹。Put the resulting assembly into the Bin folder of the Web site. 有关如何在程序集中嵌入的 JavaScript 文件的示例，请参阅[演练： JavaScript 文件作为资源嵌入程序集](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8cb78cd-95a9-4dc6-92df-391866817e89)。For an example of how to embed a JavaScript file in an assembly, see [Walkthrough: Embedding a JavaScript File as a Resource in an Assembly](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8cb78cd-95a9-4dc6-92df-391866817e89). 下面的示例显示了使用自定义控件的页。The following example shows a page that uses the custom control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/vb/Default.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示自定义控件类定义。The following example shows the custom control class definition. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/customcontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/vb/customcontrol.vb#2)] 下面的示例显示了支持的 JavaScript 文件。The following example shows the supporting JavaScript file. [!code-javascript[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/UpdatePanelAnimation.js#3)] 下面的示例显示了代码，必须添加到包含自定义控件的项目的 AssemblyInfo 文件和 JavaScript 文件。The following example shows code that you must add to the AssemblyInfo file of the project that contains the custom control and the JavaScript file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/AssemblyInfo.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/vb/AssemblyInfo.vb#4)]

returns.span: 如果已定义，则为 属性的值或 属性的值；否则为 属性的值。
